com.salimov.yurii.util.captcha

Class CaptchaImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.util.captcha.CaptchaImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Captcha

    public final class CaptchaImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Captcha
    The class implements a set of methods for working with google reCAPTCHA.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Captcha
